update apply_order
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update apply_order
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_statue = #{payStatue,jdbcType=INTEGER},

partner_sign_datetime = #{partnerSignDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update apply_order set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_phone = #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_id = #{partnerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_name = #{partnerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_phone = #{partnerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_partner = #{hasPartner,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, match_id = #{matchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_head = #{userHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partner_head = #{partnerHead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pay_statue = #{payStatue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, share_percent = #{sharePercent,jdbcType=REAL}, pay_date = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_sign_status = #{userSignStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, partner_sign_statue = #{partnerSignStatue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, patner_code = #{patnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_sign_datetime = #{userSignDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, partner_sign_datetime = #{partnerSignDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ao.id, ao.add_time, ao.match_id, ao.pay_money, ao.user_sign_status, ao.has_partner, md.theme AS match_theme, CONCAT( md.city, md.area, md.address ) AS match_address, md.start_date AS match_start_date, md.end_date AS match_end_date, md.banner_img AS match_banner_img FROM apply_order AS ao LEFT JOIN match_data AS md ON ao.match_id = md.id WHERE ao.pay_statue = 1 AND ao.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ao.add_time desc
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(has_partner + 1),0) FROM apply_order WHERE pay_statue = 1 AND match_id = #{matchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(user_sign_status >0,1,0)+IF(partner_sign_statue>0,1,0)),0) FROM apply_order WHERE pay_statue = 1 and match_id = #{matchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
